text: Julia Klöckner (born 16 December 1972) is a German politician of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) who served as Federal Minister of Food, Agriculture and Consumer Protection in the government of Chancellor Angela Merkel from 2018 to 2021.Paul Carrel and Thorsten Severin (24 January 2016), Merkel's party, sliding in polls, weighs German 'border centres' Reuters. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Agriculture ministers of Germany
title: Julia Klöckner
